Text: Ignore the guy above. This is not a fake. However, the audio is out of sync with the video. Does anyone have any suggestions on how to fix this?

@ifandbut-
the easiest way I know of to fix audio sync is to use the free and open source VLC to play videos,  
then click tools---track synchronization and there is a simples dailog box to adjust the video.

Otherwise, you can use video editing software.
its not fake, as for the audio...hum, it worked fine on the file from dailymotion. all i did was make a torrent in utorrent, sorry.
It's all good. The audio is out of sync when playing with Media Player Classic, but it ok with VLC. I guess MPC does not like mp4 file...
I keep trying to download, but I keep getting 404'd, where is this torrent?
i just shifted the audio -1900 ms. right click the video, go to options, and you'll see 'audio switcher'. the setting is there.
